message: Let's start with a simple split, Bob. I get $6000, you get $4000. It's a good deal for you considering the inflation!
I think we can do better than that, Alice! Considering the inflation, I believe this is a more fair split.
Bob, my offer is more than generous considering the inflation is working against you. Let's close this deal and move on!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Inflation is taking its toll, after all!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before the inflation eats away at your share even more!
